project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns provided by the user.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement median calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement user input feature to specify columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the analysis features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
